conservationState.condition: Before it was lost, the specimen was in a bad condition which did not allow to identify the legend and the portrait of the Roman emperor represented on the obverse.

reference.tei:title: F. Vettori, De vetustate et forma monogrammatis SS. Nominis Jesu, Romae 1747, pp. 60-64
P.M. Paciaudi, Osservazioni sopra alcune singolari e strane medaglie, Napoli 1748
C. Cavedoni, 'Médailles du temps d’Honorius portant des signes chrétiens mêlés à des types païens', Revue Numismatique 1857, pp. 309-314
F. Lenzi, 'Di alcune medaglie religiose del IV secolo', Bilychnis 2, 1913, pp. 113-131
A. Alföldi, 'Asina II. Weitere heidnische Neujahrsmünzen aus dem spätantiken Rom', GNS 2 (8), 1951, pp. 92-96

noteSet.note: Now lost. Held in the Bibliothèque nationale de France until the date of the publication of Andreas Alföldi (1951), who published the photo of it.
